long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A free less-featured loom clone that stores everything locally. Record your own videos, do mic only, camera only, or mic, camera, screen, and system audio all at once. 

Look at the source code yourself: https://github.com/aadilmallick/loolite

**Features**

- Record camera and see yourself on each webpage
- Change video aspect ratio
- Record screen (window, tab, or monitor) and system audio
- Record microphone

**Patch Notes**

- v1.0.9: added camera customization options
- v1.0.10: fixed camera bug
